text: right|thumb|Fritz Honegger Fritz Honegger (25 July 1917 - 4 March 1999) was a Swiss politician. He was elected to the Swiss Federal Council on 7 December 1977 and handed over office on 31 December 1982. He was affiliated to the Free Democratic Party. During his time in office he held the Federal Department of Economic Affairs and was President of the Confederation in 1982. ==External links== * * Category:1917 births Category:1999 deaths Category:People from Weinfelden District Category:Swiss Calvinist and Reformed Christians Category:Free Democratic Party of Switzerland politicians Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Members of the Council of States (Switzerland) Category:Politics of the canton of ZÃ¼rich
title: Fritz Honegger
